verses.verse: And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H2416><s%>: these were the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%>.

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in Kirjath <S%H7153><s%>â€“arba; the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>: and Abraham <S%H85><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to mourn <S%H5594><s%> for Sarah <S%H8283><s%>, and to weep for her <S%H1058><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his dead <S%H4191><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

I am a stranger <S%H1616><s%> and a resident <S%H8453><s%> with you <S%H5414><s%>: give me a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> with you <S%H6912><s%>, that I may bury my dead <S%H4191><s%> out of my sight <S%H6440><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, saying unto him <S%H559><s%>,

Hear us <S%H8085><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>: you are a mighty <S%H430><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> among us <S%H8432><s%>: in the choice <S%H4005><s%> of our tombs <S%H6913><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> your dead <S%H4191><s%>; none <S%H3808><s%> of us shall withhold <S%H3607><s%> from you his tomb <S%H6913><s%>, but that you may bury <S%H6912><s%> your dead <S%H4191><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, even to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.

And he talked <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H559><s%>, saying, If it be <S%H3426><s%> your mind <S%H5315><s%> that I should bury <S%H6912><s%> my dead <S%H4191><s%> out of my sight <S%H6440><s%>; hear <S%H8085><s%> me <S%H6293><s%>, and entreat for me to Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zohar <S%H6714><s%>,

That he may give <S%H5414><s%> me the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which he has <S%H7097><s%>, which is in the end of his field <S%H7704><s%>; for as much <S%H4392><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> as it is worth <S%H4392><s%> he shall give it <S%H5414><s%> me for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> among you <S%H8432><s%>.

And Ephron <S%H6085><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>: and Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, even of all that went in <S%H935><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

No <S%H3808><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, hear me <S%H8085><s%>: the field <S%H7704><s%> give I <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H4631><s%>, and the cave that is in it <S%H5414><s%>, I give it you <S%H5869><s%>; in the presence of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> I it you <S%H6912><s%>: bury your dead <S%H4191><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> bowed down <S%H7812><s%> himself before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Ephron <S%H6085><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, But if you will give it <S%H3863><s%>, I pray you, hear <S%H8085><s%> me <S%H5414><s%>: I will give you money <S%H3701><s%> for the field <S%H7704><s%>; take <S%H3947><s%> it of me <S%H6912><s%>, and I will bury my dead there <S%H4191><s%>.
And Ephron <S%H6085><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, saying unto him <S%H559><s%>,

My lord <S%H113><s%>, listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H776><s%>: the land is worth four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; what is that between <S%H996><s%> me and you <S%H6912><s%>? bury therefore your dead <S%H4191><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> unto Ephron <S%H6085><s%>; and Abraham <S%H85><s%> weighed <S%H8254><s%> to Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%>, which he had named <S%H1696><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, current <S%H5674><s%> money with the merchant <S%H5503><s%>.

And the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%>, which was in Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which was before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the cave <S%H4631><s%> which was in it <S%H6086><s%>, and all the trees that were in the field <S%H7704><s%>, that were in all the borders <S%H1366><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, were made sure <S%H6965><s%>

Unto Abraham <S%H85><s%> for a possession <S%H4736><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, before all that went in <S%H935><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> this <S%H3651><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>: the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in it <S%H6965><s%>, were made sure unto Abraham <S%H85><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> by the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>.
